{{TheAggrievedWants}} protection from {{respondentName}}

  • {{TheAggrievedIs}} the aggrieved (the person wanting protection).
    • {{#if userIsAggrieved}}
  • You are also the applicant (the person applying for a protection order)
    • {{/if}}
  • {{RespondentName}} is the respondent (the person {{theAggrievedWants}} protection from).
    • {{#unless userIsAggrieved}}
  • You are the applicant (the person applying for a protection order).
    • {{/unless}}
